name: opsd_time_series
title: Time series
description: Load, wind and solar, prices in hourly resolution
longDescription: This data package contains different kinds of timeseries data relevant for power system modelling, namely electricity prices, electricity consumption (load) as well as wind and solar power generation and capacities. The data is aggregated either by country, control area or bidding zone. Geographical coverage includes the EU and some neighbouring countries. All variables are provided in hourly resolution. Where original data is available in higher resolution (half-hourly or quarter-hourly), it is provided in separate files. This package version only contains data provided by TSOs and power exchanges via ENTSO-E Transparency, covering the period 2015-mid 2020. See previous versions for historical data from a broader range of sources. All data processing is conducted in Python/pandas and has been documented in the Jupyter notebooks linked below.

resources.name: opsd_time_series_15min
resources.title: Time series 15minutes singleindex
resources.description: All data that is avaialable in 15minutes-resolution in singleindex format

fields.name: utc_timestamp
fields.description: Start of timeperiod in Coordinated Universal Time

fields.name: cet_cest_timestamp
fields.description: Start of timeperiod in Central European (Summer-) Time

fields.name: AT_load_actual_entsoe_transparency
fields.description: Total load in Austria in MW as published on ENTSO-E Transparency Platform

fields.name: AT_load_forecast_entsoe_transparency
fields.description: Day-ahead load forecast in Austria in MW as published on ENTSO-E Transparency Platform

fields.name: AT_price_day_ahead
fields.description: Day-ahead spot price for Austria in EUR

fields.name: AT_solar_generation_actual
fields.description: Actual solar generation in Austria in MW

fields.name: AT_wind_onshore_generation_actual
fields.description: Actual wind_onshore generation in Austria in MW
